attributes.title: Gen-Z Enters the Workforce
attributes.caption: Ahhh yes the office job that we can all rely on to bring joy and happiness yet imagine if there wass someone that was slightly younger (hence why the title says generation Z?) than we expected to be up in there doin they thang and chullannn. Worken and then sleepin and worken and sleepin and worki ngand sleeping and working and sleeping thats what it’s all about baby.

Watch a new episode of BFTV every Friday!

Do you love me? WAtch us have fun and play the sims together because WE ARE BESTEST OF FRIENDS TOGETHER. attributes.caption: Two twins is better than one! Let’s put a microphone camera and see them giggle and try to kiss me. That is what the good old folks and fellars all upwards and downside the cities of Austin Texans.
attributes.description:
Watch a new episode of BFTV every Friday!

Two twins is better than one! Let’s put a microphone camera and see them giggle and try to kiss me. That is what the good old folks and fellars all upwards and downside the cities of Austin Texans. attributes.title: Dubbed Interviews
attributes.caption: Yeah so we got told that this is what we do now, we go outside and interview people which is like cool and all but is this really what we come to? Is this what we are now? Anyways my mom called and wanted me to make more friends, so if you in the area, put Coconut in the comments and I’ll hit you up. We can like chill and go to the zoo or something, idk.
